content: stay cool and stand out in this cool and comfortable crochet tee stitched in an airy mesh fabric for breathability this fun pattern lets you practice double_crochet and chain 1 mesh stitch working in one piece with just side seams and single_crochet edgings quick to make in our chainette-constructed caron colorama lacy this versatile tee adds a bit of edge and modern style to your wardrobe materials caron® colorama lacy™ 8 oz/227 g 361 yds/330 m sizes xs/s/m l/xl 2/3xl 4/5xl blue chalk 11004 3 3 3 4 balls gauge 13 sts double_crochet and chain-1 sps and 5 5 row = 4 10 cm with larger hook in mesh pat sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s/m 28-38 71-96 5 cm l/xl 40-46 101 5-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
